short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Aucta signing extension offers digital document signing from a web browser using local digital certificates

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This signing extension offers the following advantages

- Digital document signing from a web browser using local digital certificates
- Easily integrated into existing web applications
- Visible/invisible signatures

Requires native component
